an4.18:1.1: “Monks, there are these four non-prejudicial dispositions.
an4.18:1.3: One does not act under the prejudice of desire, under the prejudice of anger, under the prejudice of delusion, under the prejudice of fear.
an4.18:1.4: These are the four non-prejudicial dispositions.
an4.18:2.1: The glory of one who doesn't transgresses the Teaching
an4.18:2.2: Because of desire, anger, fear, or delusion
an4.18:2.4: Like the moon during weeks of waxing.”
